description: This file contains the implementation of StatusAdapter, a custom ListView adapter for displaying status and progress lines with color coding in an Android application. It provides methods to add info, success, and error messages, clear the list, and render items with styled text appearances.

classes.name: StatusLine
classes.description: Data class representing a line in the status list with associated text and type for styling.

inner_classes.name: Type
inner_classes.description: Enum defining the type of status: INFO, SUCCESS, ERROR.

methods.name: addInfo
methods.description: Adds an informational status line with blue styling.

methods.name: addSuccess
methods.description: Adds a success status line with amber styling.

methods.name: addError
methods.description: Adds an error status line with red styling.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears all status lines from the adapter.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Convenience method to add a status line as info.

methods.name: getCount
methods.description: Returns the number of status lines.

methods.name: getItem
methods.description: Retrieves a status line at a specific position.

methods.name: getItemId
methods.description: Returns the ID for an item, here simply the position as Long.

methods.name: getView
methods.description: Creates or reuses a view for a status line, applying appropriate styling based on type.
